login.heading: Log in to Access Dashboard
login.helpText: You are just one step away from access your dashboard. Please log in now to access your dashboard. Click on below button to log in with internet identity.

dashboard.heading: Dashboard
dashboard.welcomeText: Welcome to your dashboard on ICP REACT TEMPLATE. You can access your data and manage your account from here.
dashboard.errorText: Something went wrong. Please try again later.
